meanings.definition: To mark or stain with blotches.
meanings.sent1: She accidentally started blotching her shirt with ink.
meanings.sent2: The painter was blotching the canvas with different colors.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought it was a good idea to help by blotching the walls with its muddy paws.
meanings.sent4: Her tears were blotching the letter, making it hard to read.
meanings.sent5: The rain was blotching the sidewalk, creating a messy pattern.

meanings.sent1: The skin condition caused red blotching on her cheeks.
meanings.sent2: He noticed a strange blotching on the leaves of the plant.
meanings.sent3: The blotching on the cake made it look like a piece of modern art.
meanings.sent4: The blotching on the map indicated areas of contamination.
meanings.sent5: The blotching on the fabric gave it a unique and textured appearance.
